I am driven, hard-working and enjoy producing valuable and high quality work. I am passionate about working with modern development tools and producing quality code either independently or as part of a team.

Experience

I am currently employed as a Front-end Developer for Squiz NZ where I build and work on bespoke web-related implementations inside Matrix CMS, often including the integration of Funnelback Search. I work on small projects in my spare time, often to develop my existing skills or learn new ones.

Portfolio

I reside in the greatest little city in the world, Wellington, and spend my spare time singing and playing saxophone in local music groups.
